testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

The best professional I've ever met. We worked together for long months and he was always trying to deliver the job the way I asked and I would venture to say that he not only delivered a job according to my expectations but also surpassed it. I can only thank you and for sure we will continue to work together.
